title: Full futuristic/professional redesign (white background, single-shade blue accents, subtle ambient motion)

requirements.text: Redesign the landing page as a full layout + section redesign (still a single long scrolling page), while keeping the existing content meaning and the existing section anchors usable for navigation: #home, #about, #budget, #benefits, #donate.

quotes: Should be Full redesign of layout and sections and keep the background colour as white and others blue
...the layout remain a single long landing page

acceptanceCriteria: The site remains a single-page landing experience (no route-based multi-page navigation).
Top navigation links continue to scroll smoothly to the same anchor IDs: #home, #about, #budget, #benefits, #donate.
All existing core sections (Hero, Donation, About, Budget, Benefits, Footer) are still present, but their layout/visual structure is fully redesigned.

requirements.text: Enforce a white background across the website (light mode) and ensure the overall visual styling remains futuristic and professional with a clean, high-end look.

quotes: Change website backround colour to White
Make the website futuristic and professional

acceptanceCriteria: In light mode, the main page background renders as white (no tinted page-wide background fill).
Sections that use gradients do not remove the overall white-background feel (gradients must be subtle overlays, not solid tinted section fills).
Typography, spacing, and component styling look cohesive and intentionally 'futuristic/professional' across the entire page.

requirements.text: Constrain the color system so that all non-white accents use a single consistent shade of blue (used for primary actions, links, highlights, icons, borders/rings), and avoid introducing additional accent hues.

quotes: ...keep the background colour as white and others blue
Should all non-white elements (text, buttons, sections, accents) use the simple shade of blue...

acceptanceCriteria: Primary CTAs, interactive states (hover/focus), and key highlights use one consistent blue shade (no multiple different blues for accents).
No new accent color families (e.g., green/purple/orange) are introduced for decorative emphasis; neutrals + the single blue are used.
Theme tokens in the Tailwind/Shadcn system remain consistent with the single-blue constraint (primary/ring/accent usage does not drift into other hues).

requirements.text: Add subtle ambient motion/3D-style effects to the landing page design, using lightweight visual techniques (e.g., glassmorphism panels, soft gradients, floating shapes, gentle animated highlights) without making the page feel distracting.

quotes: Expecting motion/3D elements (subtle animations, gradients, glassmorphism)
...need subtle ambient animations (gradients, glassmorphism, floating shapes)...

acceptanceCriteria: At least 2â€“3 distinct ambient motion elements are present (e.g., slowly floating blurred shapes, subtle animated gradient sheen, gentle hover micro-interactions).
Glassmorphism is used intentionally on key surfaces (e.g., nav on scroll, hero/donation card treatments) via translucency + blur, while keeping readability high.
Animations respect accessibility: if the user has reduced-motion enabled, motion effects are reduced/disabled (no continuously moving elements).

requirements.text: Update the sticky top navigation visual treatment to match the futuristic redesign (white background context + glassmorphism on scroll), while preserving existing navigation behavior and contact CTA usability.

quotes: Make the website futuristic and professional
Expecting motion/3D elements (subtle animations, gradients, glassmorphism)

acceptanceCriteria: The nav remains fixed at the top and continues to change style on scroll as it does now (scrolled vs not scrolled state).
The scrolled state uses a futuristic/glass-like style (translucent + blur), consistent with the single-blue accent constraint.
Desktop and mobile menu interactions still work (open/close, smooth scroll to anchors, Donate/Support button scrolls to #donate).

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui (compose only).
Do not add new backend services or databases; keep the backend as a single Motoko actor (no backend changes required for this redesign).
Use English for any user-facing text changed/added as part of the redesign.
nonGoals: Do not convert the site into a multi-page app with routing.
Do not add authentication flows or new backend-driven features.
Do not change donation/bank details content, contact details, or directors list content (only restyle/re-layout them as part of the redesign).
